verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Yes, my Beloved
He's the fairest of ten thousand

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Yes, He is holy
And He is humble
Meek and lowly

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Daughters of Jerusalem
Tell me if you find Him
I am lovesick
I am lovesick

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
All I want is to be near You with You
Where You are
